actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Banking.

committees.committee: Senate Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs

official_title: A bill to prohibit the Federal Asset Disposition Association from paying severance pay in excess of certain civil service amounts.

summary.text: Requires the Federal Home Loan Bank Board to issue a regulation prohibiting the payment of severance pay by the Federal Asset Disposition Association in excess of any payable to a Federal employee at the GS-18 level.

titles.title: A bill to prohibit the Federal Asset Disposition Association from paying severance pay in excess of certain civil service amounts.
